title: Government Spending Tracker
description: A transparent, social platform for tracking and engaging with government spending in real-time.
overview: Transform how citizens interact with public finance through our Venmo-like social experience for government transactions.

features.title: Transaction Tracking
features.description: Every government payment tracked with unique ID, timestamp, and purpose

features.title: Social Engagement
features.description: Like, comment, and share government transactions

features.title: Real-time Updates
features.description: See government spending as it happens

features.title: Public Oversight
features.description: Citizens can follow and monitor specific agencies or programs

details: Our government spending tracker transforms how citizens interact with public finance by creating a Venmo-like social experience around government transactions.
